title: Smell very good.
review: The aroma of this candle is very sweet. It last a lot. I'll buy it again.

title: Presque pas parfumée
review: Je souhaitais avoir une bougie qui parfume toute la maison et ce n’est pas le cas

title: Yankee this!
review: Some candles are better than others. This particular one is little too strong smelling but tolerable for hour at a time. Pricing freshness.

title: Smells good!
review:
I will buy more in the future and these make the perfect gifts!
The Midsummer's Night scent is perfect for men!

title: Ugh terrible scent
review:
Have no idea what the scent is supposed to be but it’s very subtle and even then it’s not a nice scent.
Don’t waste your money.

title: j'adore l'odeur
review: Que dire de cette odeur , plutôt masculine , ce que j'adore , un fond de musk comme je les aimes ..

title: Best scented candle
review: Best yankee scent in my opinion. Good value

title: Price
review: too expensive

title: Long lasting candle
review: Wonderful scent!

title: Came with wax licking all over the lid
review: I would't purchase - when i received this there was wax all over the lid and it was pretty messy to clean.

title: Gorgeous aroma
review: I adore the aroma of baby powder. Relaxes you . Like smelling a newborn baby.

title: Both Chocolate Layer Cake AND Pumpkin Apple Parfait smell wonderful
review:
I've had Chocolate Layer Cake before years ago and it was a favourite then. I hadn't had any in years, since Yankee stopped shipping to Canada.

But when I saw it on Amazon, I ordered one. It smells, as I said in the title, very much just as good as I remember it. Just delicious chocolate cake. You can smell both the cake and the rich icing And it just smells chocolatey and wonderful.

It's burning well too.

I found that these desserty candles almost just as good as eating actual cake. I actually use them as a diet aid. I light one up each day, take a few deep breaths, mediate, read and relax for a few hours. It leads to less actual cravings for desserts as I feel like I'm already having the experience of it each day.

Chocolate just makes me happy. And this is a really nice chocolate

As for the Pumpkin Apple Parfait, I just tried it for the first time and loveit too.

It has a beautiful apple scent. I then do smell a vanilla/caramelly scent. And then there is some pumpkin in there too. Although the cent of this one faded quite a bit afew days in But overall, I'm happy with this one too. Both smell delicious

title: Very disappointed
review: I was looking forward to this candle for 6 months ,got amazon card for my birthday and ordered it ..Yankee Candles were my favorite ,The smell of the chocolate cake was not the smell of chocolate cake ..I burned it for a while and still not smelling like chocolate cake ..I was thinking maybe sat on shelf for years ..Don't know .But will not be ordering any again.

title: Yankee never disappoints
review: This candle arrived very securely packaged all intact. As usual Yankee Candles never disappoint me. Descent appears to be absolutely awesome. Looking forward to burning it at Christmas time. The fragrance seems spot on for mistletoe. You could never go wrong with a Yankee candle. Highly recommended.

title: Scent is incredibly weak.
review: candle for 3 hours and didn’t smell anything from a distance of 3 ft in a closed space. Glass is also very fragile, broke the tip of the jar easily but it’s still holding the candle inside

title: Not impressed
review: Candle smelled nice but it burned awkwardly did not burn for the hours it said it would most of the candle wax was surrounding the jar when the wick was at the end not happy

title: The wrong scent was delivered and it even broke.
review: The wrong scent was delivered and it even broke. :(

title: Love the smell
review: Smells soooo good

title: No Scent
review: Have had in car for over a week and still no scent

title: Nice
review: Love the scent and great for gift

title: One of my favourite scents....
review: But too much black smoke if the wick get a little long. You need to cut wick regularly which gets a little difficult.

title: Best ever bought
review: All good

title: Good scent, way over priced.
review: The scent is nice but the item is way over priced.

title: DISAPPOINTING
review:
I really love the smell of this candle but I never got the chance to enjoy it. I ordered it once and it shows up broken. i get a replacement and it shows up even more broken than the last time.

I'm annoyed and frustrated. I've bought other candles from this company and they are amazing. it's just disappointing that for whatever reason I never got the chance to try this one.

smells good before burning at least.

title: Great product
review: My mother loves it!!!!

title: Smell very good
review: Smell very good

title: another fine candle.
review: as advertised, smells as it should. excellent packaging, great delivery service. light the candle for at least 4 hrs.' at a time. it keeps the 'puddle' even.

title: broken glass
review: arrived broken. it was wrapped in bubble wrap, not a cardboard brace like other candles are, and the lid area was shattered. The small box with the candle was inside a larger box, even though it didn't come with any other products, so it probably moved around a lot.

title: A FANTASTIC Experience!!!
review: Interacting with UrbanInspirations was a true pleasure! I will definitely look to order from them again in the future!!!

title: The size was good and smell is nice
review: Glad candle was for me and not a gift as it came looking like it has already melted the lid was a mess

title: Authentic, Lovely, Cozy.
review: Lovely. I’ve ordered Yankee candles straight from their website before and have found that certain scents are not as “strong” as others. Does not mean they are not authentic, it depends on the candle you purchase. This candle is a potent, lovely scent that fills the room, but not too strong as I find BBW candles. It came in original Yankee Candle packaging as well, so no need to worry about the authenticity, it is the real deal. I love the fresh clean scent of this candle, perfect for gifting or keeping for yourself. Will be ordering more :)

title: Good product.
review: Smell good.

title: Very nice scent
review: These smell wonderful. Packaged well.

title: Livraison un peu tard
review: Bonne odeur

title: Good quality candles
review: One of my favourite scents smells like clean clothes, and the scent payoff is great! These Yankee jars also take a very long time to burn out completely, worth the price if you’re looking for a quality candle.

title: 5 Stars if you like men's cologne
review: I gave it 5 Stars because the scent is clean and really fills the room. I picked it based on the name and my love of the moon, but I forgot to read about the smell and I hate it, but that's my fault. It's like men's cologne. If that's what you're looking for, it's a great candle.

title: Used to hate it - Now I love it
review: I know people say that this smells like men's Axe, but it actually has a clean linen smell thats musky and masculine. It smells so SEXY. Smelling this, makes me feel like I am in a fresh clean bed always!

title: Yankee Candle Company Clean Cotton Large Jar Candle
review: Great candle, great scent and fragrance, and long lasting, and even burning. Love Yankee Candles for the quality. I have tried many other candles, and none can hold a flame to the Yankee Candle.... (pun intended).

title: Super chocolatey
review: Love it but can only burn for short time as it is very strong but that is better than not enough

title: Love the scent
review: Gift

title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Mediterranean Breeze
review: Love Yankee Candles. They have a great scent that can fill large rooms, while still being subtle and fragrant. Burns very evenly.

title: Highly recommend
review: Fresh & clean scent. Long lasting. Smells like fresh laundry.

title: Great smell
review: The box is just plain cardboard and says yankee candle on it, not pretty at all. The candle is big and it smells amazing, I got the Christmas Eve candle

title: Defective
review: Candle arrived with all of the wax tilted to one side, completely covering the wick. Entirely unusable.

title: Smell good
review: It smells really good, it reminds me of someone from my past and I like it, come in a great padded package. i recommend it

title: Beautiful candle
review: Smells awesome

title: Nice candle
review: My one and only favorite!

title: Fragrance Inaccurate
review: Does not smell like cinnamon at all.

title: Great Scents
review:
As Described. Great product.
Can't find these in NS, Canada and with Borders closed online is my only option.
Thanks!

title: Awesome smells great
review: Smells great, lasts a long time.....

title: Bad quality of scent
review: Not recommended

title: smells like nothing dont waste your money
review: smells like nothing

title: Long lifetime
review: Long lifetime, smelling wonderful!

title: Very satisfied & smells incredible!!
review: I've been wanting a Yankee Candle for a long time and when I found it on Amazon I was so happy! The candle was delivered the next day, perfect packaging, and it smells so so good! I love the smell of fresh laundry/ clean cotton so this one was an easy choice! This candle is also great as a gift or a decor piece and im going to rider more scents for Christmas gifts!

title: No, I won't be buy again
review: It's so weird.. It does not smell as strong as the one I bought from Winners.. Looks like the fake version of Yankees Candles.. I don't recommend it

title: PASS :(
review:
The Clean Cotton scent is very fresh as burns beautifully, but the spice Pumpkin was awful. Meh scent and the wick burned horrible.

These candles are way too expensive to play the hit or miss game. Would not recommend.

title: Counterfeit or 5-10 years old
review: I think these are either 5-10 years old or counterfeit. They are not traditional yankee candle quality and have a fraction of the scent as the authentic ones do. Do not order

title: Never leave a candle burning.
review: Canadian Thanksgiving!

title: Softly cocoa
review: It was excellent choice. Not too much strong, but it is softly warmer. If you like the cocoa smell, I recommend you. Good delivery

title: My favorite scented candle
review: Amazing candle, one of my favorites. Clean cozy scent everyone loves

title: broken item on delivery
review:
looking for replacement or money back

Thanks Jeff

title: Lacking scent?
review: I usually love this scent of yankee candle, but this one hardly contains any smell! I’m pretty disappointed because I paid quite a bit more than I would in store, for the convenience of shopping online, only to get one that hardly smells. I’m not sure if the candle was old, mismanaged during shipping or storage, or if it’s defective but they generally smell strongly of a real cinnamon stick. These candles are wonderful if you get one that has enough scent to it.

title: 👌
review: as described

title: Usual fragrance but not as strong as I remember.
review: Beware the packaging. First order came with the glass upper rim broken. Very quick return and replacement in 2 days. Great candle and I have bought several times but the fragrance is not as strong as I remember this time.

title: Smell nice
review: It smells nice and looks the same as the description.

title: Perfect candle
review: The scent of this Clean Cotton candle is amazing!! I was worried about the shipment for this, but it came in a protective cardboard packaging in a box. No shatter and fast shipment. It was my first time purchasing a Yankee Candle and yes, it was a perfect purchase.

title: Odeur
review:
Bonjour,
Dégage peu d'odeur parfumé

title: Love it
review: Love this candle

title: Wonderful smell
review: Smells very nice!!! Wonderful. Will order again!!

title: Exactly as expected from Yankee. Great products.
review: Shipping time was more than expected but understandable during these times.

title: Smells like a men’s cologne.
review: I do not like the smell of this candle. It’s awful. I’m more of an earthy candle buyer. This is not my thing. If u like the smell of a man in your house...guess this one is for you.

title: Coconut Vanilla
review:
Gross smell. Cannot smell coconut or vanilla . It’s also not black, at first it glowed rusty brown , now it’s a berry red.
Not sure how to describe this scent- rotten potatoes?

title: Subtle and Nice
review:
Really nice and simple smelling candle. I was worried it would be overpowering or “fake” smelling like a lot of scented candles are, but the clean cotton is perfect.

The smell is quite subtle, I think I would recommend getting a 3 wick candle if you want a stronger scent.

title: Chocolate layer cake candle
review: Smells absolutely delicious, by far one of the best candles I’ve ever had!!❤️

title: Exactly as described
review: Smells like chocolate cake.

title: Great smell. Sage and citrus is wonderful.
review: Smells great! Burns great.. But the wax seems to be separated in places.. Overall good candle.

title: Yummy
review: Boyfriend things it smells funny but I love it. Haven’t lit it in a while but can still smell it. Little pricey in my opinion but I haven’t had it that long so we’ll see how long it lasts to make up for the price

title: happy with purchase 🙂
review: Fast delivery...not damaged...SMELLS FANTASTIC!!!!!!

title: It arrived broken!
review:
The top part of the glass holder of the candle was shattered.
The package was full of broken glasses.
I cannot find a way on Amazon website to report this.
I am pretty disappointed!

title: Broken on delivery
review: Candle was delivered smashed

title: Cam broken.
review: Came broken like the pictures.

title: Just okay, I guess..
review: Kinda cute, smells good when I smush it in my face, but otherwise does not impact the overall smell of the car.. plus, the recommended change period written on the packaging is useless, since I could hang a new one once a week and still not smell a thing.. I am a BIG Yankee candle fan, but this product just doesn’t livr up to their usual standards.

title: It took a long time to arrive & box was damaged so candles all fell out
review: I didn't think the smell would be so sweet...could've been my misinterpretation as I prefer a more spicy type smell.

title: Burns even
review: Yankee candles are the best

title: Cassé
review: Elle était cassé

title: THE SMELL OF A SNACKK
review: Smells great and the bar is nice. Only thing I didnt like is the packaging but that's not why you buy a candle

title: Great !
review: Exactly as expected

title: The best scent yet!
review: The scent of Fresh Cut Roses is far superior to any other of the scents available. I had gone to a Yankee Candle store in St. Catharines, Ontario and they told me this was only a Summer Item and only available on line (if I was lucky). I loved this so much that my last order was a Christmas present for some of my friends and family. Please keep this scent available.....it's a keeper!

title: good
review: good

title: Doesn't smell like lavender.
review: Doesn't smell like lavender, but smells good enough for what it is. It is super strong, so make sure it's not on a vent that is on all the time, and it will last at least a few months (mine is on month three).
